features: Eye Friendly LED: Fliker-free lighting won’t harm the eyes when reading ,working or studying.Built with LED panel, so no bulb changing trouble in coming 50000 hours.
Stepless Sliding llumination: Sliding touch dimming,light brightness can be adjusted freely,5 color modes & 5 brightness levels for your choice.
Touch-Sensitive Control Panel & Memory Function & Timer Function: Dimmable desk lamp with touch-pull panel design, easy to adjust, sleek and simple.

Foldable and Portable Design: foldable LED desk lamp with 225° flexible arm and 80° base axis, aluminum folding lamp arm and lamp head to save desk space. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases and box.

USB charging function: USB port keeps your phone at a full charge & within reach. Himigo desk lamps enjoy 12-month warranty. Any quality problem, please do feel free to email us, we will help you within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Touch-Sensitive Control Function Lightly your fingers along the touch pad to set the brightness level Auto-Off Timer 30/60 minutes automatic shutdown function, designed for reading before bedtime Handy USB Charging Port Power your devices with a built-in 5V/1A USB port. keep your smartphone or tablet within reach while charging. Fully Adjustable Angle With 180° adjustable arm and 90° rotating axis base, you can effortlessly adjust the lamp for ideal illuminating angle and coverage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright when needed and takes little space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice night light
reviews.reviewText: Good price and work very well for night stand lights. Adjustable shades of light and brightness adjustment is nice. I love light so wouldn’t mind if they went brighter but overall serve their purpose well and are a good value for the price. I like the simple streamlined design too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was good, but it died.
reviews.reviewText: So I gave this lamp a year after I bought it before deciding if I liked it or not. Most lamps seem to die about a year in. Short life spans, I guess! Im a nail tech and, well, it did the job! It fit nicely on my desk, folded up, was sturdy, nice and bright, and just a good little lamp. Only downside is it randomly shut off one day and wouldn't turn back on. Not bad for what I paid! Just frustrating that I now have to buy a new one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This light is serving well for my purpose.
reviews.reviewText: The light was delivered in a reasonable amoun tof time and was packaged safely.The brightness is somewhat adjustable from dim to its brightest via a touch panel on the light's base. That toush panel as well as all the other controls, is not an array of protruding switches, but a capacitive toush system. There's a touch location for On/OFF, for a few different automatic OFF settings and one to change the light from flourescent to incandescent modes. There's more than one different shades of the incandescent look.The light looks nice and the stand holds the light in place well. The light swivels and adjusts in 3 directions while the stand can remain in the place where set by the user.I bought the light to put where I tie fly baits. It helps me see better. There's times I think I want the light to be a little brighter, but my eyes don't work as well some days as they work on other days. Oh well.The timer mode sometimes catches me by surprise because it turns the light off automatically after an amount of time dependent on how the timer is set. I can't designate which exact button pushes control the different functions, but that's likely detailed in the instructions. I only read enough of the instructions to get the light on and off.The light runs via a USB wall wart. There's no internal battery that I can tell. There's 2 USB receptacles on the back of the base. I'm running the light with the USB C connector plugged into the base. The other USB receptacle is USB A.So far I'm happy with the light. If I see the need I'd buy an additional one - or - more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice little light. I have it sitting on my desk. It has several different lighting options from low to high. It also has a USB port for charging your phone which is nice and works great. Provide swivels so you can move the light where you want without having to move the base. There is a timer for how long do you want to keep the light on as well as gymnast and brightness options. They thought of a lot of nice options and extras with this light. Very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for nail techs
reviews.reviewText: Super cheap and super bright. You can change the brightness. Great little inexpensive light to use on your nail table. it moves easily even has a usb port on the side so you can plug other things to it. I use the side to keep my phone charged making one less item needed to be put into the outlet. super compact. folds up. great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up great for rc pit bench
reviews.reviewText: I used this for indoor rc carpet racing having multiple light settings was nice. The adjustable brightness is great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It only worked as advertised after the 3 day!
reviews.reviewText: Does not do anything after 3 day. Would not even work with the plug in?
Útil, de buen materia. Contento con la compra
Llegó a tiempo. Es lo q esperaba y hasta ahorita a funcionado muy bien.
En general es una lámpara funcional. La luz no es tan nitida pero cumple su función

Es lo que buscaba, porque puedo ajustar la intensidad y color de la luz según la actividad que vaya a realizar, el largo del cable de conexión está muy bien puedo colocar la lámpara en cualquier lugar de la mesa y alcanza para conectarla, estoy feliz con mi compra

I am surprised how expensive simple lamps are now. i am glad i found this. it is cheaper than most lamps i have seen and does a great job. it has decent hight and great touch features to dim and change light colors. the only con i would give this is that it might be sensitive when connected to a power bar. i have this connected to devices that constantly change their power usage, and this lamp is able to detect it. sometimes it would flicker in response to power fluctuations. when those devices are off, no problems. all in all a great lamp for late-night studying.
